## StandardFacets() function

A component that displays simple facets applicable to the current vertical search.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function StandardFacets(props: StandardFacetsProps): JSX.Element;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  props | [StandardFacetsProps](./answers-react-components.standardfacetsprops.md) | [StandardFacetsProps](./answers-react-components.standardfacetsprops.md) |

<b>Returns:</b>

JSX.Element

A React component for facets

## Remarks

Numerical facets is not included. Hierachical facets will not be display in a tree level structure. Use `hiddenFields` to exclude hierachical facets, if any, when using this component.
